verses.verse: Why do you boast <S%H1984><s%> of mischief, <S%H7451><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> man? <S%H410><s%> God's loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures continually. <S%H3117><s%>
Your tongue <S%H3956><s%> plots <S%H2803><s%> destruction, <S%H1942><s%> like a sharp <S%H3913><s%> razor, <S%H8593><s%> working <S%H6213><s%> deceitfully. <S%H7423><s%>
You love <S%H157><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> more than good, <S%H2896><s%> lying <S%H8267><s%> rather than speaking <S%H1696><s%> the truth. <S%H6664><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
You love <S%H157><s%> all devouring <S%H1105><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> you deceitful <S%H4820><s%> tongue. <S%H3956><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> will likewise destroy <S%H5422><s%> you forever. <S%H5331><s%> He will take you up, <S%H2846><s%> and pluck you out <S%H5255><s%> of your tent, <S%H168><s%> and root you out <S%H8327><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> also will see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H3372><s%> and fear, and laugh at him, <S%H7832><s%> saying,

"Behold, <S%H1397><s%> this is the man who didn't <S%H7760><s%> make God <S%H430><s%> his strength, <S%H4581><s%> but trusted <S%H982><s%> in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of his riches, <S%H6239><s%> and strengthened <S%H5810><s%> himself in his wickedness. <S%H1942><s%>"

But as for me, <S%H7488><s%> I am like a green olive tree <S%H2132><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%> I trust <S%H982><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>'s loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

I will give you thanks <S%H3034><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> because you have done <S%H6213><s%> it. <S%H6960><s%> I will hope in your name, <S%H8034><s%> for it is good, <S%H2896><s%> in the presence of your saints. <S%H2623><s%>
